title: Who wants to see an Owned Skins page?
body: Just have a page with all your owned skins similar to the shops layout if not the same so we can browse all the skins we own.

replies.body: People have been asking for this for years. Don't expect it to ever come.
That would be cool, or even just a way to see owned skins easier :).
OMFG This would be perfect i spent almost a hour going though my champion list and writing them all down total = 481 skins ( 17 chromas)
